sentences.chinese: 優酷藏在搜狐視頻心裏呢，花呀。

sentences.english: The footage has been watched more than 1.5m times on the popular Youku video sharing site.
sentences.chinese: 在優酷網上，這段視頻已被播放了超過150萬次。

sentences.english: But unfortunately you might have found it no longer geilivable to use Xunlei to download this video.

sentences.english: Youku and Ku6 were both founded by former Sohu managers.
sentences.chinese: 優酷和酷六都是由前搜狐高管創立的。

sentences.english: It has already attracted more visitors than Sohu.
sentences.chinese: 現在，優酷吸引的訪客已超過搜狐。

sentences.english: Investor interest in Youku has already cooled significantly.
sentences.chinese: 投資者對優酷的興趣已經大減。

definition: iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
barrage (military)/"bullet screen", function which allows viewers to post on-screen comments in videos, movies etc in real time/danmaku (video game subgenre)
to watch a TV series etc regularly/to binge-watch
